dashboard.label: Unifi Overview
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1_new_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=* sourcetype=unifi:cloud:sites 
| dedup uniqueSiteName 
| stats sum("statistics.counts.wifiDevice") as wifiDevice, sum("statistics.counts.wiredDevice") as wiredDevice","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-4h@m","latest":"now"}},"name":"Unifi_devices"},"ds_search_1_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=* sourcetype=unifi:cloud:sites 
| stats latest("statistics.counts.offlineDevice") as offlineDevices by uniqueSiteName","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-4h@m","latest":"now"}},"name":"unifi_sites_offlinedevices"},"ds_search_1_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=* sourcetype=unifi:cloud:sites 
| timechart avg("statistics.percentages.txRetry") as txRetry by uniqueSiteName","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-4h@m","latest":"now"}},"name":"unifi_txretry"},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=* sourcetype=unifi:cloud:sites | timechart latest("statistics.counts.wifiClient") as WifiClients by siteName","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-4h@m","latest":"now"}},"name":"unifi_sites_wificlients"},"ds_e6PnWPhR_ds_search_1_new_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=* sourcetype=unifi:cloud:sites 
| dedup uniqueSiteName 
| stats sum("statistics.counts.wifiDevice") as wifiDevice, sum("statistics.counts.wiredDevice") as wiredDevice","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-4h@m","latest":"now"}},"name":"Unifi_devices copy 1"}},"visualizations":{"viz_table_1_new":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"majorValue":"> sparklineValues | lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues | delta(-2)","sparklineValues":"> primary | seriesByName('wifiDevice')"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new_new_new"},"title":"Wifi Devices","showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false},"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new_new"},"title":"Offline Devices"},"viz_chart_1_new":{"type":"splunk.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new"},"title":"txRetry %","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"auto","y2AxisAbbreviation":"auto","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"xAxisLabelRotation":0,"xAxisTitleVisibility":"show","yAxisTitleVisibility":"show","y2AxisTitleVisibility":"show","yAxisScale":"linear","showOverlayY2Axis":0,"y2AxisScale":"inherit","nullValueDisplay":"connect","dataValuesDisplay":"off","showSplitSeries":0,"showIndependentYRanges":0,"legendMode":"standard","legendDisplay":"right","lineWidth":2}},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"splunk.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"auto","y2AxisAbbreviation":"auto","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"xAxisLabelRotation":0,"xAxisTitleVisibility":"show","yAxisTitleVisibility":"show","y2AxisTitleVisibility":"show","yAxisScale":"linear","showOverlayY2Axis":0,"y2AxisScale":"inherit","nullValueDisplay":"connect","dataValuesDisplay":"off","showSplitSeries":0,"showIndependentYRanges":0,"legendMode":"standard","legendDisplay":"right","lineWidth":2},"context":{}},"viz_SaKi5iJn":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"majorValue":"> sparklineValues | lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues | delta(-2)","sparklineValues":"> primary | seriesByName('wiredDevice')"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new_new_new"},"title":"Wires Devices","showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":1175},"structure":[{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":5,"w":590,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_1_new","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":10,"w":590,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":260,"w":400,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_table_1_new","type":"block","position":{"x":890,"y":260,"w":300,"h":130}},{"item":"viz_SaKi5iJn","type":"block","position":{"x":580,"y":260,"w":300,"h":130}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"title":"Unifi Overview","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}}}
